customers.name: Rosita Lagarde
customers.notes: Latest Global Economic Trends to talk to Rosita

customers.name: Charles M. Burns
customers.notes: After flashbacks reveal Bobo's journey through history, the bear ends up in the hands of Maggie Simpson. Burns does everything in his power to get Bobo back.

customers.name: Miguel Jackson
customers.notes: I took my baby on a Saturday bang. Boy is that girl with you? Yes we're one and the same...

customers.name: Kevin Panceta Bacon
customers.notes: See, this is our time to dance. It is our way of celebrating life.

customers.name: Juan Lenon
customers.notes: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
